subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jeff Monken, a former assistant at Navy, takes over a Black Knights program that has lost 12 straight games to the rival Midshipmen and has had only one winning season since 1996.
snippet: Jeff Monken, a former assistant at Navy, takes over a Black Knights program that has lost 12 straight games to the rival Midshipmen and has had only one winning season since 1996.
